title: good magazine
content:
does anyone know the typeface GOOD magazine uses? attached is an image with an example. i wanted to know what both the headline and the subheader paragraph right below it is... if anyone knows.

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [-1.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907032508/http:/typophile.com/files/-1.jpeg) | 217.77 KB |

author: mandabuck

comments.content:
Vista Sans Alt & Vista Sans Regular.
